WorldObjectDef.Name: GeneratedAsteroidGiant
WorldObjectDef.description: A giant vacstone asteroid that was towed into orbit around the planet as part of a mining operation long ago. However, mechanoid interference halted the process before most of its valuable resources could be extracted.\n\nThis location can be reached using transport pods, shuttles, or a gravship.
